--- title: "Schedule" author: "Teaching Team" --- # Workshop Schedule Welcome to the EPA101 Workshop Schedule page. This schedule outlines the key dates, workshops, and deliverables for the course. Some workshops are focused on collaborative learning and do not have associated deliverables, while others coincide with important assignment due dates. Use this schedule to manage your time effectively and ensure you're prepared for each class. Please note that not all workshops have deliverables due. Workshops without deliverables are designed to help you develop your project through collaborative discussions and activities. Make sure to attend each workshop prepared to engage with the material and your peers. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
EPA PCA Workshop Schedule
Date Activity Deliverable
Sept. 16 Workshop #1:
Define the problem and assemble some evidence 		No
Sept. 18 Draft #1 due:
Sector Analysis & Problem Definition assignment 		Yes
Sept. 25 Workshop #2:
Construct the alternatives 		No
Oct. 9 Workshop #3:
Select the criteria 		No
Oct. 21 Draft #2 due:
Revisions of Draft #1 + Policy Alternatives & Evaluation Criteria 		Yes
Oct. 28 Workshop #4:
Project the outcomes 		No
Nov. 13 Workshop #5:
Confront the trade-offs 		No
Dec. 2 Draft #3 due & Final Presentations:
Stop, focus, narrow, deepen and decide; Tell your story 		Yes
Dec. 16 Final Policy Analysis Paper (PAP) due Yes
````` ::: ::: Good luck, and we look forward to your participation throughout the course!
